stabilized-ica 1.0.1
Release Notes

Please cite us if you use the software.

  • API Reference
    • sica.annotate: Biological annotation of ICA components
    • sica.base: Main class and function
    • sica.mutualknn: Mutual K-Nearest Neighbors
    • sica.singlecell: Stabilized-ICA for single cell data

API Reference¶

This is the class and function reference of stabilized-ica.

sica.annotate: Biological annotation of ICA components¶

annotate.reactome.ReactomeAnalysis

Provide tools for running reactome enrichment analysis for different metagenes.

annotate.toppfun.ToppFunAnalysis

Provide tools for running Toppfun enrichment analysis for different metagenes.

sica.base: Main class and function¶

base.StabilizedICA

Implement a stabilized version of the Independent Component Analysis algorithm

base.MSTD(X, m, M, step, n_runs[, whiten, …])

Plot “MSTD graphs” to help choosing an optimal dimension for ICA decomposition.

sica.mutualknn: Mutual K-Nearest Neighbors¶

mutualknn.MNN(k, metric, X[, Y])

Given two arrays X and Y or a precomputed distance matrix computes the undirected adjacency matrix using the Mutual Nearest Neighbors method.

mutualknn.MNNgraph(data, names, k[, metric, …])

Given a list of data sets, draws the MNN graph with a networkx object (compatible with the software Cytoscape)

sica.singlecell: Stabilized-ICA for single cell data¶

singlecell.ica(data, observations, …[, …])

Compute stabilized ICA decomposition for AnnData formats.
